DDBJ  renewed HP in August 1, 2011, and changed the following points.<img src="data:image/png;base64,">RSS of "Update information" in the top page was shifted to getentry.In the top page, a new RSS for the latest news such as "Hot Topics"starts. So, please change settings.<img src="data:image/png;base64,">The twitter icon is  set up in top page. "Follow", please.<img src="data:image/png;base64,"> Google Search is applied to the "Site Search".Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.
